segments.text: Good evening , Saliva . What's that wonderful aroma from your kitchen ? What are you doing now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have studied its skills recently at a training school . I plan to run a restaurant , so I have to practise cooking !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a good idea . What dish are you cooking now ? !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am steaming fish in a pressure cooker . Have you ever tried steamed fish ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have . But the taste of steamed fish at that restaurant is not delicious . The fish is not well-done and too salty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the case . I think there is not enough time to steam it and soy sauce is too much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have the same idea as yours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's OK . Please have a taste of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Oh , it's very delicious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Besides steamed fish , what else are you good at cooking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am good at stewing beef with potato , frying chicken , hot and sour soup etc .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So many dishes . Next Friday week is my birthday . I would like to invite you to cook for my dinner party , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? It is a good opportunity for me to practise cooking .
segments.speaker: S2
